# startAnimating()

**Instance Method**

Starts the animation of the progress indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func startAnimating()
```

## Discussion

When the progress indicator is animated, the gear spins to indicate indeterminate progress. The indicator is animated until [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView/stopAnimating()] is called.

## Managing an activity indicator

- **stopAnimating()**: Stops the animation of the progress indicator.
- **isAnimating**: A Boolean value indicating whether the activity indicator is currently running its animation.
- **hidesWhenStopped**: A Boolean value that controls whether the activity indicator is hidden when the animation is stopped.
